FuncDef: This command configures the service payload (Maximum Transmission Unit - MTU), in bytes, for the service. This MTU value overrides the service-type default MTU. Theservice-mtudefines the payload capabilities of the service. It is used by the system to validate the SAP and SDP binding s operational state within the service.

ParaDef.Info: The size of the MTU in octets, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 9194.

ExtraInfo:
Default: apipe, fpipe: 1508ipipe: 1500epipe: 1514Table 13 shows MTU values for specific VC types.
				Table 13: 
			MTU Values SAP VC-TypeExample: Service MTUAdvertised MTU
Ethernet15141500
Ethernet (with preserved dot1q)15181504
VPLS15141500
VPLS (with preserved dot1q)15181504
VLAN (dot1p transparent to MTU value)15141500
VLAN (Q-in-Q with preserved bottom Qtag)15181504
